name: #ZC '90s Mazda Eunos Roadster
description:
Mazda Eunos Roadster for MUTINY | Touge and Drifting community - https://discord.gg/hTvVF9TEGG
We have Assetto Corsa servers!

NOTES:
- Set steering degrees (steer lock) to 1008°
- Enable "More physically accurate gyro implementation" in Settings > Custom Shaders Patch > FFB Tweaks
- Direct Drive wheels enable "Output real steering forces to wheel" in Settings > Custom Shaders Patch > FFB Tweaks and match "Wheel peak torque" value to your wheelbase power
- Non Direct Drive wheels enable "Range compression assist" at 100% in Settings > Custom Shaders Patch > FFB Tweaks
- Reduce FFB to appropriate level

Driver Model Download — https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ma11SD8cYwH5TXAQQ7nOmtkJDuoBUEvl/view?usp=drive_link

If you like these cars, check out the cars that inspired this pack from Team Excite!
https://www.vosan.co/driftcarpacks/excite-v2-extended/
https://www.vosan.co/driftcarpacks/excite-x-kuba-przygoski-car-pack/

CREDITS:
Model — Gran Turismo 7
Physics — Modified Arch Physics by Winters (Arch doesn't provide support for modified physics)
Physics (Tyres) — Modified Arch tyres by witly (Excite!)
Bucket seat — Macedo
Tire model — phani
Soft top — Gran Turismo Sport
Sound — redSerpente
Soft top details — Crew 2 extracted by Joe325

Touge & Drifting content at https://www.youtube.com/@MUTINYSIM
author: Winters | MUTINY
